phrases: The world has become a superhuman society,
and about 80 of the world's population now has some kind of special trait.
In this world swirling with chaos,
the profession that everyone once dreamed about and admired
came into the limelight.
Heroes of justice fighting villains and saving people from distress.
Yes, this is the story of how I became the greatest hero.
Midoriya.
I am going to beat you.
The students from the other courses are aiming for the top with everything they have got!
I cannot afford to fall behind.
I will be going for it with everything I have, too.
In Their Own Quirky Ways
The YOU.A. sports festival first-year stage qualifier!
The first game is an obstacle course race!
It is a cruel chicken race where anything goes as long as you stay on course!
Hey.
-We will bring you the exciting scenes
-with camera robots set around the course!
-You do not need me, do you?
Now then-
Can the golden eggs aiming to be future heroes get through the mass of Robo Infernos?!
If they went through all this trouble, I wish they would have prepared something better.
Since my stupid old man is watching.
He stopped them!
Between their legs!
We can get through!
I would not if I were you.
I froze them when they were unbalanced.
They will fall over.
The first one through the first barrier is Shoto Todoroki from Class 1-A!
Hey!
Someone is trapped underneath!
Would not that kill them?
Will people die at this sports festival?!
Like I would die!
Kirishima from Class 1-A was underneath!
That is crazy!
That bastard, Todoroki!
He timed it on purpose so it would be right when they fell.
If it had not been me, someone would have died!
Eijiro Kirishima Quirk: Hardening
Eijiro Kirishima!
Quirk: Hardening!
His body can get super hard!
He can become the strongest spear, or the strongest shield!
That Class A...
Tetsutetsu from Class B was also underneath!
That is crazy!
If it had not been me, someone would have died!
Tetsutetsu Tetsutetsu Quirk: Steel
Tetsutetsu Tetsutetsu.
Quirk: Steel!
His body can become like steel!
He can become the strongest spear, or the strongest shield!
Our Quirks are pretty much the same?!
I have a hard enough time standing out as it is!
Wait, you little-!
Those guys are lucky...
They can get through without being afraid of getting crushed.
Anyway, let us work together for now to clear a path!
Bakugo?!
Like I would let you get ahead of me!
Class 1-A's Bakugo!
Since the bottom's blocked, he goes overhead!
Clever!
You seem like you would be the type to plow straight through,
but you can go around when you need to, huh?
I am going to hitch a ride!
Hanta Sero Quirk: Tape
Hanta Sero.
Quirk: Tape!
He can shoot tape-like material from his elbows!
He can also wind it up and use it to move!
Land!
Aye, aye!
Fumikage Tokoyami Quirk: Dark Shadow
Fumikage Tokoyami.
Quirk: Dark Shadow!
He is got a shadow-like monster living inside him
that can materialize and change shape elastically!
As expected, most of the group that is gone ahead is from Class A.
Class B and the other courses are not bad, either!
It is just...
Those who experienced firsthand
that world above them through the incident at USJ...
Release!
Those who had fear planted in their hearts...
Those who dealt with it and pulled through...
They all used that experience to drown out their hesitation.
I cannot rely on One For All this early in the competition!
It is the armor of the one Todoroki defeated!
That robot will lock onto the target and track it.
I will make it build up momentum...
And then-
It will not be able to stop suddenly!
Move!
Move!
This can be a shield, too!
It will be useful!
Yaoyorozu!
A piece of cake.
The path is clear!
She defeated those zero-point villains so easily?
No wonder she got in through recommendations.
During the entrance exam, they were there to be avoided.
If you see them as things to be defeated, they are dumb hunks of metal.
You will start to see openings.
I want you to tell the world I am here!
I told him that even though I knew it would be unreasonable.
It does not matter if it is close!
Just get to the next round!
Hey, hey!
The first barrier's a piece of cake?
Then what about the second?
If you fall, you are out!
If you do not want to fall, then crawl!
It is The Fall!
When did they build this stage?
Tsu?
Ribbit!
Ribbit.
This is like a glorified tight rope.
She is fast!
Glitter.
Here it is!
Here is my chance to show off!
It is time for my support items to be in the limelight!
heh heh heh heh heh
Look, all you support companies across the country!
Wire arrows and... hover soles!
Glitter!
You are from the support course?
What?
It is okay to bring in items?
The hero course undergoes combat training regularly, right?
In order to keep things fair,
we are allow to equip items and costumes,
as long as we developed them ourselves!
Or perhaps I should say...
this is the place where we can show off our ideas and skills to companies!
Come, take a look, all you companies!
Especially the big ones!
Look at my super cute babies!
Wow.
That is so annoying...
I cannot lose!
That is some misplaced equality!
Nice...
A lot of different people are working hard for their chance, huh, Eraser Head?
What are you idiots stopping for?
And now, the leader of the pack is easily getting through first!
Looks like he is getting fired up.
A slow starter?
Damn it!
My older brother is probably also watching.
I cannot let him see me act uncool!
That is so uncool!
That guy in first place is way ahead!
His Quirk is really strong,
but his natural athletic ability and judgment are also a cut above everyone else's.
Of course it is.
That is the Flame Hero, Endeavor's son.
No wonder!
The blood of the guy second only to All Might, huh?
There will be fighting over who gets him as a sidekick!
The lead pack is a step ahead, but below them, everyone is clumped together!
They have not announced how many people will make it through,
so you cannot relax!
Push forward!
Izuku...
And now, we have quickly arrived at the final barrier!
The reality here is...
It is set up so that you can tell where the mines are if you look carefully!
So you have to exploit your eyes and legs!
By the way, these landmines are for games, so they are not that powerful,
but they are loud and flashy enough to make you wet your pants!
That depends on the person.
First place is already there?
Faster... Faster...!
I see.
This is an obstacle that puts those in the lead at a disadvantage.
Trying to make it entertaining, huh?
This does not affect me!
Bastard, do not declare war to the wrong person!
And now, we have got someone new in the lead!
Rejoice, mass media!
It is the kind of development you guys love!
Hey, hey, hey, the rest of the pack is also speeding up!
However!
Even as they push and pull at each other, can the two at the top remain in the lead?
It... It is far...!
But there is still stuff I have to do!
Boom
I am going to borrow your idea, Kacchan!
There is a huge explosion at the back?!
What is with that force?!
What?!
Was it an accident, or did he do it on purpose?
Class A's Midoriya is in hot pursuit with that blast!
Landmines used for games...
The type with fuses that go off if you step on them.
They are not that powerful,
but if I lose my balance and set off a bunch of them,
I will lose a lot of time.
If I take injuries and stamina into account,
it would be better to slow down and avoid them.
The jumpers cannot jump carelessly either,
and the further ahead you are, the more landmines you will have to avoid.
They probably cannot go very fast with all the obstacles.
Look carefully!
The places where those in front avoided...
Everyone was the most careful around the entrance.
There are a lot of landmines left.
It will be fine.
-What is Midoriya doing?
-Do not be impatient here!
In the lead are Bakugo and Todoroki!
They will get through the last barrier soon!
All right.
I am going to borrow your idea, Kacchan!
Super explosive speed turbo!
That is...!
Class A's Midoriya is in hot pursuit with that blast!
Actually, he is taken the lead!
I flew just like I would planned,
but there is so much force!
And...
I did not think about landing!
Deku!
Do not go ahead of me!
This will give those in the back a path...
The two formerly in the lead have stopped trying to slow each other down
and are chasing Midoriya!
Now that they have a common enemy, they have stopped fighting!
The fight's not over yet, though!
What are you saying?
Oh no...
I am losing speed...!
That is not surprising...
They will overtake me in an instant!
Thinking about the time I would lose landing,
there is no way I would be able to take back the lead.
Damn it!
No!
Do not let go!
Grab hold of that chance you got to get in front of these two, and do not let go!
If I cannot take back the lead,
then I cannot let them get ahead of me!
Midoriya swiftly blocks those behind him!
Would you believe it?
He cleared the minefield in an instant!
Eraser Head, your class is amazing!
What are you teaching them?!
I did not do anything.
They got each other fired up on their own.
Not listening?!
Who could have predicted the developments at the beginning or this conclusion?
Right now, the first person back in the stadium is that man...
Izuku Midoriya's made a huge splash!
Izu...!
Hey, that kid's...
Oh yeah.
If I remember correctly, he is from last year...
Authorized Personnel Only
This brat is...
This sports festival is a competition where they have to aim for the top,
even if it means defeating their friends and classmates.
Modern heroes depend a lot on their popularity,
so they need to have that desire to be above all the others.
At your core, you are a hero who wants to help others.
That is why I chose you,
but I thought that was also your weakness.
I was worrying over absolutely nothing!
Sorry!
You should still try to stop being such a crybaby, though.
What do you think?
First of all, Midoriya's stock will climb fast.
However, he still has not shown his Quirk yet, so it is hard to predict what will happen.
If you took on management of an agency, how would you market him?
Opinions?
What do you think?
His appearance is out.
If he were particular about his abilities or aesthetics, we could highlight those parts,
but without the raw material to work with...
That business course!
They never change, huh?
Business Course
The business course!
There is not really any benefit to them participating in the sports festival!
-Therefore, they cultivate their instincts by selling things or doing marketing simulations!
-Get your bentos here!
Get your bentos here!
noise noise talk talk
They have got a lot of free time!
Again...
Damn...!
Damn it...!
And now, they are finishing one after another!
We will make a list of the results later, but for now, good work!
Deku!
You were amazing!
-Uraraka?
-I cannot believe I fell behind with this Quirk...
-First place is amazing!
-I cannot believe I fell behind with this Quirk...
-That is so frustrating, dang it!
-I still have a long way to go...!
-I-It was just... -I still have a long way to go...!
I was just lucky!
I just happened to be able to use something I thought I could use.
What is amazing was my luck.
It was a lucky punch.
My real ability will be tested after this...
This is not how it was supposed to...
I killed two birds with one stone!
I am a genius!
You are the worst!
The first game of the first-year stage is finally over.
Now, take a look at the results!
Class A: Izuku Midoriya
Class A: Shoto Todoroki
Class A: Katsuki Bakugo
Class B: Ibara Shiozaki
Class B: Juzo Honenuki
Class A: Tenya Iida
Class A: Fumikage Tokoyami
Class A: Eijiro Kirishima Class A Hanta Sero
Class B: Tetsutetsu Tetsutetsu
Class B: Yosetsu Awase Class A: Mashirao Ojiro Class A: Tsuyu Asui
Class A: Rikido Sato Class A: Ochaco Uraraka Class A: Mezo Shoji
Class A: Momo Yaoyorozu Class A: Minoru Mineta
19th: Mina Ashido 20th: Koji Koda 21st: Kyoka Jiro
22nd: Sen Kaibara 23rd: Kosei Tsuburaba 24th: Denki Kaminari
25th: Kojiro Bondo 26th: Reiko Yanagi 27th: Hitoshi Shinso
Dang it...
Class A: Yuga Aoyama
The top 42 made it through to the next round.
It is unfortunate, but do not worry even if you did not make it!
We have prepared other chances for you to shine.
The real competition begins next!
The press cavalry'll be all over it!
Give it your all!
Now then, here is the second game.
I already know what it is,
but what could it be?
What could it be?
I just said it, and now here it is...
A cavalry battle?
I am bad at those...
-It is not an individual event, so I wonder how it will work...
-Cavalry battle!
Let me explain.
The participants can form teams of two to four people as they wish.
It is basically the same as a regular cavalry battle,
but the one thing that is different is...
A point-based system like the entrance exam, huh?
That is easy to understand.
In other words, each team is worth different points depending on who is on the team!
I see!
You guys do not hold back even though I am talking, huh?!
Yes, that is right!
And the points assigned go up by five starting from the bottom.
So 42nd place gets five points, and 41st gets ten points!
And the point value assigned to first place is...
T-Ten million?!
Ten million, huh?
In other words, if you take down the first place player's team...
That is right.
It is survival of the fittest, with a chance for those at the bottom to overthrow the top!
Preview
Let us talk about the next episode, Deku.
The second round is the cavalry battle!
Usually, four people fight as a team, but...
Deku, you are lonely, huh?
Did I get labeled a loner without knowing it?
Deku, you are lonely, huh?
She said it twice!
Next time, Strategy, Strategy, Strategy!
Deku's tears will shoot out like a geyser!
Go beyond!
Next time: Strategy, Strategy, Strategy
Plus Ultra!
